author: bayard
msg: Changed the explanation of where dependencies will be.

author: bayard
msg: Made String taglib dependent on Commons.Lang's beta release.
StringW is heavily lessened. XmlW depends on StringUtils. Other classes

author: bayard
msg: Fixed an error in the stripStart and stripEnd methods. They would happily
run off the end of the String if the String was mostly made up of the
Added a stripAll method which allows all elements in an array to be stripped.

author: bayard
msg: All rtexprvalue's in the string.xml changed from false to true, it being
deemed that it's better to have a permissive taglib than a restrictive one.

author: bayard
msg: The random methods return the same value within the same millisecond due
to the methods creating a new Random object each time. I've pulled out the
Random object and made it static so it can be reused.
